item.description:
Welcome to Westborough Spirituality meeting April group.

Last month, we had a great meeting. Thanks Fred, Jan, Judy and Marcella.
We discussed about the meaning of life and how it influenced by people's life.

This month's meeting we can share more about our spiritual life and How we practice in our daily life!

I would like to welcome all the friends with peaceful mind to join!

If you like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.
item.how_to_find_us: "#147 will be 2nd buildling on your right, when you drive in. Ring the doorbell"
item.name: Westborough spirituality April meetup
